statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_keys;
SELECT wallet_address, key_type FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE key_type = 'public';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM blockchain_wallet_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT key_type, COUNT(*) AS total_keys FROM blockchain_wallet_keys GROUP BY key_type;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE key_type = 'public' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT wallet_address, key_type FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE key_id > 100 ORDER BY key_type ASC
SELECT key_id, key_type, key_value FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE wallet_address LIKE '0x%' AND key_type IN ('public', 'private')
SELECT key_id, wallet_address, key_type, created_at FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY key_id DESC
SELECT key_id, wallet_address, key_type, key_value FROM blockchain_wallet_keys WHERE key_type NOT IN ('test') ORDER BY wallet_address ASC, key_type DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallets;
SELECT wallet_address, public_key FROM blockchain_wallets;
SELECT wallet_id, private_key FROM blockchain_wallets ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT wallet_id, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_wallets;
SELECT wallet_address, public_key FROM blockchain_wallets WHERE wallet_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_address, public_key FROM blockchain_wallets ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, transaction_type, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT * FROM keys;
SELECT wallet_id, key_type FROM keys ORDER BY key_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT wallet_name, creation_date FROM wallets WHERE wallet_id = '2ecce596-ba2b-4bd5-a349-9bae0d04749a';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM keys WHERE key_type='public';
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='credit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM keys WHERE key_type='private' AND key_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT wallet_id, transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallets;
SELECT owner_name, public_key FROM wallets ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT wallet_id FROM wallets WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_data, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE wallet_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, prev_block_id, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE block_data LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'root';
SELECT * FROM Wallets;
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_name FROM Wallets WHERE wallet_name = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, public_key, timestamp FROM PublicKeyHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Wallets ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT wallet_name, public_key FROM Wallets WHERE wallet_id = 2;
SELECT address_id, address FROM Addresses WHERE wallet_id = 3 AND address LIKE '1%';
SELECT wallet_id, public_key, private_key FROM Wallets INNER JOIN PublicKeyHistory ON Wallets.wallet_id = PublicKeyHistory.wallet_id;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM Transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
